line_1: Of cards, admirers, equipage bereft;
line_2: Her insolence, and title only left;

line_1: Should They, of ev'ry other means bereft,
line_2: Make my right-hand a witness 'gainst my left;

line_1: Yet are you not of all bereft;
line_2: For still a fair Retreat is left:

line_1: Of hope, the wretch's last resort, bereft,
line_2: By friends, by kindred, by my lover, left.

line_1: While She who wrote 'em, of all Joy bereft,
line_2: To the rude Censure of the World is left;

line_1: Which, were the earth of sun and stars bereaved,
line_2: Favourite of heaven! she at her birth received

line_1: Of ev'ry Help, of ev'ry Hope bereft;
line_2: While I forlorn and desolate was left,

line_1: That, of your guardian care bereft,
line_2: To dire disease and death your darling should be left.

line_1: Why is my life prolong'd? of bliss bereft?
line_2: Joseph is not: – My single comfort left,

line_1: In magnitude and beauty, which bereaved
line_2: Of such investment, eye had ne'er perceived.

line_1: By nature's course not distant; sad and 'reft
line_2: Will she remain, — the lonely pilgrim left.

line_1: And thro' thy Malice be of this bereft;
line_2: Make me believe, I have no Senses left,

line_1: Tho' of The Foundress, not the Dole Bereft.
line_2: For She to many a Subsistance left,

line_1: Of every kindly-soothing hope bereft!
line_2: But, ah! how chang'd my fate, forlorn I'm left,

line_1: Of Friends, and Children both, I am bereft,
line_2: And soon must lose the only Blessing left;

line_1: And do not murmur, when you are bereft
line_2: Of little, if you have abundance left.

line_1: A pledge of gratitude, of all things else bereft.
line_2: And with a faithful subject left

line_1: Others I saw, which were not quite bereft
line_2: Of Sense, tho' very Small Remains were left,

line_1: A glorious death; of his lov'd lord bereft,
line_2: The pious office unperform'd he left.

line_1: Of youthful gaiety bereft,
line_2: Had scarce an unbroach'd pleasure left;

line_1: All — all are lost! — of thee, blest Saint, bereft,
line_2: We mourn, to whom impoverished life is left:

line_1: Like Cain roam, of bliss bereft,
line_2: No clime, no country yours, no friendly shelter left.

line_1: Of rest was Noah's dove bereft,
line_2: When with impatient wing she left

line_1: At length of hope itself bereft,
line_2: When now no friendly look was left,

line_1: OF all I valued, all I lov'd, bereft,
line_2: Say, has my heart this little comfort left?

line_1: Befriend thee of all other friends bereft,
line_2: And give thy life its only cordial left?

line_1: Shiftless at length, of all resource bereft,
line_2: In the dire gripe of Punishment he's left.

line_1: For you, of other good bereft,
line_2: Unchanging love will still be left;

line_1: "Of every joy bereft."
